# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.8 FATAL_ERROR)
SET(VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR "/home/sudarshan/.visit/3.3.3/linux-x86_64/plugins")
INCLUDE("/usr/local/visit33/3.3.3/linux-x86_64/include/PluginVsInstall.cmake")
INCLUDE("/usr/local/visit33/3.3.3/linux-x86_64/include/VisItLibraryDependencies.cmake")

PROJECT(FLASHX_database)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
FLASHXPluginInfo.C
FLASHXCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
FLASHXPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
FLASHXMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtFLASHXFileFormat.C
avtFLASHXOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
FLASHXEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtFLASHXFileFormat.C
avtFLASHXOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IFLASHXDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IFLASHXDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IFLASHXDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MFLASHXDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MFLASHXDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MFLASHXDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MFLASHXDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EFLASHXDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFLASHXDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFLASHXDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFLASHXDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EFLASHXDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFLASHXDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFLASHXDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFLASHXDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
